description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the secure boot security feature bypass vulnerability (CVE-2024-28920), you need to apply the relevant updates.

1. Download and install the updates corresponding to your Windows build from the Microsoft Update Catalog:
   - KB-5036894
   - KB-5036893
   - KB-5036892
2. Ensure your systems are running one of the following Windows builds:
   - 10.0.19045.4291
   - 10.0.19044.4291
   - 10.0.22631.3447
   - 10.0.22000.2899
   - 10.0.22621.3447

**Details**:
These updates address a crucial exposure related to protection mechanism failure. It is important to ensure all updates are applied as required to maintain system integrity against potential security threats. 

Check the official Microsoft [Update Guide](https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/vulnerability/CVE-2024-28920) for additional instructions and details regarding installation. 

**Preconditions**:
- Verify that you are running one of the specific builds mentioned.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the updates.
